Name: Mistcaller
About the game: A young girl with the power to control a supernatural mist remembers only one thing - her brother has been kidnapped. Navigate the haze, uncover family secrets, solve mind-bending puzzles, and discover the truth in this artistic platformer. ABOUT THIS GAME A young girl awakens alone, her mind void of the events that led to her solitude. All she knows is that her brother has been taken, and the answers to her plight lie somewhere within a strange mist encasing the world. Using her newfound power to control the unsettling haze, Eve ventures deep into the unknown, hoping to unlock her memories and the truth of her past. Guided by a disembodied voice speaking from the shadows, Eve overcomes dangerous obstacles and solves challenging puzzles on a journey to find her brother and herself. At the heart of the mystery sits two rival families, each with their own dark secrets. The more Eve uncovers of the feuding houses and the closer she gets to finding her brother, the more sheâ€™ll wish she remained amnesiac. Mistcaller is a supernatural puzzle platformer inspired by games like Limbo. Fully hand-drawn, the uniquely artistic world encased within the mist is beautifully rendered. Control the Mist. Harness the power of the mist to navigate an eerie world and unravel its secrets. Use Your Mind. Help Eve solve a series of intricate puzzles and overcome dangerous obstacles. The Story Beneath the Mist. Explore a deep and rich narrative centered around an ongoing conflict between rival families and uncover Eve's place in it all. An Ode to the Classics. Mistcaller pays tribute to quintessential platformers and their remarkable art styles.
